column4: Hi guys is there any way for making flash based web site in ubuntu ?
Hi guys is there any way for making flash based web site in ubuntu ?
flash is proprietary to adobe and they dont make linux software afaik
i am basically a web designer i feel like my freedom has been stolen
yep, adobe love doing that, they suck
I got a Job to do i will have to install MS and Adobe CS again ?
i guess, you can install it with cedega or crossover and it may work
they are paid for software though, it may run with wine too
if you run: sudo fdisk -l ; mount    you can see whats going on, if its not mounted, manually mounted
has the disk been in a windows system?
did you use the safetly remove hardware functionality or did you just rip it out?
But now it is not detected in that too
But now it is not detected in windows too
this is exactly why you need to use that, you have damaged your data by abusing your hardware
now what should i do
the saftely remove hardware icon isnt there for a laugh, its to be used so you dont damage the file system
: Now what
you can try foremost to recover the data, or you may be able to make the disk a single partiton like it was
i need no data from it
i'd go for foremost personally, remember: gracefully remove usb devices or it WILL happen again
then use gparted to make a partition on the device and format it as you need
: u r such an
lifesaver
